titlestmt.titleproper: Pierce, Edward Lillie, 1829-1897, recipient. Edward Lillie Pierce letters from various correspondents, 1854-1897 (MS Am 1.65): Guide.

change.item: hou01482 converted by Harvard University Library OIS from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.xsl (sy2006-06-08).

titlepage.titleproper: Pierce, Edward Lillie, 1829-1897, recipient. Edward Lillie Pierce letters from various correspondents, 1854-1897: Guide.
titlepage.author: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library
titlepage.p: Â© 2004 The President and Fellows of Harvard College

did.repository: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library, Harvard University
did.unittitle: Edward Lillie Pierce letters from various correspondents,
did.abstract: Letters to Massachusetts lawyer Edward Lillie Pierce from Charles Francis Adams, Samuel Portland Chase, Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, Carl Schurz, and many other correspondents.

acqinfo.p: Gift of the family of Edward Lillie Pierce; received: 1918.

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on physical access to this material. Collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation for Publication:
prefercite.p: Edward Lillie Pierce Letters from Various Correspondents, 1854-1897 (MS Am 1.65). Houghton Library, Harvard University.

bioghist.p: Pierce, a lawyer, held many civil offices in Massachusetts, was active in Republican politics, and was the official biographer and executor of Charles Sumner.

scopecontent.p: Includes letters to Pierce from Charles Francis Adams, Salmon Portland Chase, Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, and Carl Schurz, among many others. Items with an asterisk also include a typed transcription.
